   By Lin Chia-tung, Lu Hsien-hsiu, and Lery Hiciano  
   Former Keelung Department of Civil Affairs director Chang Yuan-hsiang was detained for allegedly illegally accessing the household registration system to assist the Chinese Nationalist Party (KMT) in its recall campaigns. [Read more](News/taiwan/archives/2025/05/06/2003836428)
